verses.verse: Give ear, <WH238> O ye heavens, <WH8064> and I will speak; <WH1696> and hear, <WH8085> O earth, <WH776> the words <WH561> of my mouth. <WH6310>

My doctrine <WH3948> shall drop <WH6201> as the rain, <WH4306> my speech <WH565> shall distill <WH5140> as the dew, <WH2919> as the small rain <WH8164> upon <WH5921> the tender herb, <WH1877> and as the showers <WH7241> upon <WH5921> the grass: <WH6212>
Because <WH3588> I will publish <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the LORD: <WH3068> ascribe <WH3051> ye greatness <WH1433> unto our God. <WH430>

He is the Rock, <WH6697> his work <WH6467> is perfect: <WH8549> for <WH3588> all <WH3605> his ways <WH1870> are judgment: <WH4941> a God <WH410> of truth <WH530> and without <WH369> iniquity, <WH5766> just <WH6662> and right <WH3477> is he. <WH1931>
They have corrupted <WH7843> themselves, their spot <WH3971> is not <WH3808> the spot of his children: <WH1121> they are a perverse <WH6141> and crooked <WH6618> generation. <WH1755>

Do ye thus <WH2063> requite <WH1580> the LORD, <WH3068> O foolish <WH5036> people <WH5971> and unwise? <WH3808> <WH2450> is not <WH3808> he <WH1931> thy father <WH1> that hath bought <WH7069> thee? hath he <WH1931> not made <WH6213> thee, and established <WH3559> thee?

Remember <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of old, <WH5769> consider <WH995> the years <WH8141> of many generations: <WH1755> <WH1755> ask <WH7592> thy father, <WH1> and he will show <WH5046> thee; thy elders, <WH2205> and they will tell <WH559> thee.

When the most High <WH5945> divided <WH5157> to the nations <WH1471> their inheritance, when he separated <WH6504> the sons <WH1121> of Adam, <WH120> he set <WH5324> the bounds <WH1367> of the people <WH5971> according to the number <WH4557> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
For <WH3588> the LORD's <WH3068> portion <WH2506> is his people; <WH5971> Jacob <WH3290> is the lot <WH2256> of his inheritance. <WH5159>

He found <WH4672> him in a desert <WH4057> land, <WH776> and in the waste <WH8414> howling <WH3214> wilderness; <WH3452> he led him about, <WH5437> he instructed <WH995> him, he kept <WH5341> him as the apple <WH380> of his eye. <WH5869>

As an eagle <WH5404> stirreth up <WH5782> her nest, <WH7064> fluttereth <WH7363> over <WH5921> her young, <WH1469> spreadeth abroad <WH6566> her wings, <WH3671> taketh <WH3947> them, beareth <WH5375> them on <WH5921> her wings: <WH84>
So the LORD <WH3068> alone <WH910> did lead <WH5148> him, and there was no <WH369> strange <WH5236> god <WH410> with <WH5973> him.

He made him ride <WH7392> on <WH5921> the high places <WH1116> of the earth, <WH776> that he might eat <WH398> the increase <WH8570> of the fields; <WH7704> and he made him to suck <WH3243> honey <WH1706> out of the rock, <WH4480> <WH5553> and oil <WH8081> out of the flinty <WH4480> <WH2496> rock; <WH6697>

Butter <WH2529> of kine, <WH1241> and milk <WH2461> of sheep, <WH6629> with <WH5973> fat <WH2459> of lambs, <WH3733> and rams <WH352> of the breed <WH1121> of Bashan, <WH1316> and goats, <WH6260> with <WH5973> the fat <WH2459> of kidneys <WH3629> of wheat; <WH2406> and thou didst drink <WH8354> the pure <WH2561> blood <WH1818> of the grape. <WH6025>

But Jeshurun <WH3484> waxed fat, <WH8080> and kicked: <WH1163> thou art waxen fat, <WH8080> thou art grown thick, <WH5666> thou art covered <WH3780> with fatness; then he forsook <WH5203> God <WH433> which made <WH6213> him, and lightly esteemed <WH5034> the Rock <WH6697> of his salvation. <WH3444>
They provoked him to jealousy <WH7065> with strange <WH2114> gods, with abominations <WH8441> provoked they him to anger. <WH3707>

They sacrificed <WH2076> unto devils, <WH7700> not <WH3808> to God; <WH433> to gods <WH430> whom they knew <WH3045> not, <WH3808> to new <WH2319> gods that came <WH935> newly up, <WH4480> <WH7138> whom your fathers <WH1> feared <WH8175> not. <WH3808>
Of the Rock <WH6697> that begot <WH3205> thee thou art unmindful, <WH7876> and hast forgotten <WH7911> God <WH410> that formed <WH2342> thee.
And when the LORD <WH3068> saw <WH7200> it, he abhorred <WH5006> them, because of the provoking <WH4480> <WH3708> of his sons, <WH1121> and of his daughters. <WH1323>

And he said, <WH559> I will hide <WH5641> my face <WH6440> from <WH4480> them, I will see <WH7200> what <WH4100> their end <WH319> shall be: for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are a very froward <WH8419> generation, <WH1755> children <WH1121> in whom is no <WH3808> faith. <WH529>

They <WH1992> have moved me to jealousy <WH7065> with that which is not <WH3808> God; <WH410> they have provoked me to anger <WH3707> with their vanities: <WH1892> and I <WH589> will move them to jealousy <WH7065> with those which are not <WH3808> a people; <WH5971> I will provoke them to anger <WH3707> with a foolish <WH5036> nation. <WH1471>

For <WH3588> a fire <WH784> is kindled <WH6919> in mine anger, <WH639> and shall burn <WH3344> unto <WH5704> the lowest <WH8482> hell, <WH7585> and shall consume <WH398> the earth <WH776> with her increase, <WH2981> and set on fire <WH3857> the foundations <WH4146> of the mountains. <WH2022>
I will heap <WH5595> mischiefs <WH7451> upon <WH5921> them; I will spend <WH3615> mine arrows <WH2671> upon them.

They shall be burnt <WH4198> with hunger, <WH7458> and devoured <WH3898> with burning heat, <WH7565> and with bitter <WH4815> destruction: <WH6986> I will also send <WH7971> the teeth <WH8127> of beasts <WH929> upon them, with <WH5973> the poison <WH2534> of serpents <WH2119> of the dust. <WH6083>

The sword <WH2719> without, <WH4480> <WH2351> and terror <WH367> within, <WH4480> <WH2315> shall destroy <WH7921> both <WH1571> the young man <WH970> and <WH1571> the virgin, <WH1330> the suckling <WH3243> also with <WH5973> the man <WH376> of gray hairs. <WH7872>
I said, <WH559> I would scatter them into corners, <WH6284> I would make the remembrance <WH2143> of them to cease <WH7673> from among men: <WH4480> <WH376>

Were it not that <WH3884> I feared <WH1481> the wrath <WH3708> of the enemy, <WH341> lest <WH6435> their adversaries <WH6862> should behave themselves strangely, <WH5234> and lest <WH6435> they should say, <WH559> Our hand <WH3027> is high, <WH7311> and the LORD <WH3068> hath not <WH3808> done <WH6466> all <WH3605> this. <WH2063>
For <WH3588> they <WH1992> are a nation <WH1471> void <WH6> of counsel, <WH6098> neither <WH369> is there any understanding <WH8394> in them.
O that <WH3863> they were wise, <WH2449> that they understood <WH7919> this, <WH2063> that they would consider <WH995> their latter end! <WH319>

How <WH349> should one <WH259> chase <WH7291> a thousand, <WH505> and two <WH8147> put <WH5127> ten thousand <WH7233> to flight, <WH5127> except <WH518> <WH3808> <WH3588> their Rock <WH6697> had sold <WH4376> them, and the LORD <WH3068> had shut them up? <WH5462>
For <WH3588> their rock <WH6697> is not <WH3808> as our Rock, <WH6697> even our enemies <WH341> themselves being judges. <WH6414>

For <WH3588> their vine <WH1612> is of the vine <WH4480> <WH1612> of Sodom, <WH5467> and of the fields <WH4480> <WH7709> of Gomorrah: <WH6017> their grapes <WH6025> are grapes <WH6025> of gall, <WH7219> their clusters <WH811> are bitter: <WH4846>
Their wine <WH3196> is the poison <WH2534> of dragons, <WH8577> and the cruel <WH393> venom <WH7219> of asps. <WH6620>
Is not <WH3808> this <WH1931> laid up in store <WH3647> with <WH5978> me and sealed up <WH2856> among my treasures? <WH214>

To me belongeth vengeance, <WH5359> and recompense; <WH8005> their foot <WH7272> shall slide <WH4131> in due time: <WH6256> for <WH3588> the day <WH3117> of their calamity <WH343> is at hand, <WH7138> and the things that shall come <WH6264> upon them make haste. <WH2363>

For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> shall judge <WH1777> his people, <WH5971> and repent himself <WH5162> for <WH5921> his servants, <WH5650> when <WH3588> he seeth <WH7200> that <WH3588> their power <WH3027> is gone, <WH235> and there is none <WH657> shut up, <WH6113> or left. <WH5800>
And he shall say, <WH559> Where <WH335> are their gods, <WH430> their rock <WH6697> in whom they trusted, <WH2620>

Which <WH834> did eat <WH398> the fat <WH2459> of their sacrifices, <WH2077> and drank <WH8354> the wine <WH3196> of their drink offerings? <WH5257> let them rise up <WH6965> and help <WH5826> you, and be <WH1961> <WH5921> your protection. <WH5643>

See <WH7200> now <WH6258> that <WH3588> I, <WH589> even I, <WH589> am he, <WH1931> and there is no <WH369> god <WH430> with <WH5978> me: I <WH589> kill, <WH4191> and I make alive; <WH2421> I wound, <WH4272> and I <WH589> heal: <WH7495> neither <WH369> is there any that can deliver <WH5337> out of my hand. <WH4480> <WH3027>
For <WH3588> I lift up <WH5375> my hand <WH3027> to <WH413> heaven, <WH8064> and say, <WH559> I <WH595> live <WH2416> forever. <WH5769>

If <WH518> I whet <WH8150> my glittering <WH1300> sword, <WH2719> and mine hand <WH3027> take hold <WH270> on judgment; <WH4941> I will render <WH7725> vengeance <WH5359> to mine enemies, <WH6862> and will reward <WH7999> them that hate <WH8130> me.

I will make mine arrows <WH2671> drunk <WH7937> with blood, <WH4480> <WH1818> and my sword <WH2719> shall devour <WH398> flesh; <WH1320> and that with the blood <WH4480> <WH1818> of the slain <WH2491> and of the captives, <WH7633> from the beginning <WH4480> <WH7218> of revenges <WH6546> upon the enemy. <WH341>

Rejoice, <WH7442> O ye nations, <WH1471> with his people: <WH5971> for <WH3588> he will avenge <WH5358> the blood <WH1818> of his servants, <WH5650> and will render <WH7725> vengeance <WH5359> to his adversaries, <WH6862> and will be merciful <WH3722> unto his land, <WH127> and to his people. <WH5971>

And Moses <WH4872> came <WH935> and spoke <WH1696> <WH853> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> song <WH7892> in the ears <WH241> of the people, <WH5971> he, <WH1931> and Hoshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>
And Moses <WH4872> made an end <WH3615> of speaking <WH1696> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words <WH1697> to <WH413> all <WH3605> Israel: <WH3478>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Set <WH7760> your hearts <WH3824> unto all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> which <WH834> I <WH595> testify <WH5749> among you this day, <WH3117> which <WH834> ye shall command <WH6680> <WH853> your children <WH1121> to observe <WH8104> to do, <WH6213> <WH853> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law. <WH8451>

For <WH3588> it <WH1931> is not <WH3808> a vain <WH7386> thing <WH1697> for <WH4480> you; because <WH3588> it <WH1931> is your life: <WH2416> and through this <WH2088> thing <WH1697> ye shall prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> in <WH5921> the land, <WH127> whither <WH834> <WH8033> ye <WH859> go over <WH5674> <WH853> Jordan <WH3383> to possess <WH3423> it.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> that <WH2088> selfsame <WH6106> day, <WH3117> saying, <WH559>

Get thee up <WH5927> into <WH413> this <WH2088> mountain <WH2022> Abarim, <WH5682> unto mount <WH2022> Nebo, <WH5015> which <WH834> is in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> that <WH834> is over <WH5921> against <WH6440> Jericho; <WH3405> and behold <WH7200> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> I <WH589> give <WH5414> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> for a possession: <WH272>

And die <WH4191> in the mount <WH2022> whither <WH834> <WH8033> thou <WH859> goest up, <WH5927> and be gathered <WH622> unto <WH413> thy people; <WH5971> as <WH834> Aaron <WH175> thy brother <WH251> died <WH4191> in mount <WH2022> Hor, <WH2023> and was gathered <WH622> unto <WH413> his people: <WH5971>

Because <WH5921> <WH834> ye trespassed <WH4603> against me among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah-Kadesh, <WH4809> <WH6946> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin; <WH6790> because <WH5921> <WH834> ye sanctified <WH6942> me not <WH3808> in the midst <WH8432> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

Yet <WH3588> thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH853> the land <WH776> before <WH4480> <WH5048> thee; but thou shalt not <WH3808> go <WH935> thither <WH8033> unto <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I <WH589> give <WH5414> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
